setup.comment1: All the entries in this section are optional.
setup.comment2: For environmental_variables, you can change the names of the variables if needed.

id1w.comment: The value is ignored when 'always' is specified, this command will always be run.
id1w.cmd: echo OS is [%ST_OS%] with selector tag [%ST_TAG%] and values [%ST_VALUE1%], [%ST_VALUE2%]

id1u.comment: The value is ignored when 'always' is specified, this command will always be run
id1u.cmd: echo OS is [$ST_OS] with selector tag [$ST_TAG] and values [$ST_VALUE1], [$ST_VALUE2]

id2.comment: Run this command if the tag passed on the command line matches 'DEV'

id3.comment: Run this command if the tag passed on the command line does not match 'DEV'

id4.comment: The value is ignored when 'never' is specified, this comand will never be run
